roleset.name: to advance slowly
roleset.note: CRAWL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'crawl' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from crawl.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with direction
example.text: For months the Johns Hopkins researchers , [*-1] using gene probes , experimentally crawled down the length of chromosome 17 , [*-1]looking for the smallest common bit of genetic material lost [*] in all tumor cells .
example.arg: [*-1] looking for the smallest common bit of genetic material lost [*]in all tumor cells

example.name: prepositional Arg1
example.text: Colleagues today recall with some humor how meetings would crawl into the early morning hours [*T*-1] as Mr. Dinkins would march his staff out of board meetings and into his private office [*-2]to discuss , en masse , certain controversial proposals .
example.arg: as Mr. Dinkins would march his staff out of board meetings and into his private office [*-2] to discuss , en masse , certain controversial proposals
